Kelly

Introduction

Ha Seoyeon, known under her stage name Kelly, is a South Korean singer and dancer under BPM Entertainment. She is best known as the maknae of the girl group BADVILLAIN.

On May 15, 2024, Kelly was revealed as the first member of BADVILLAIN. The group officially debuted on June 3, 2024, with their debut single album "OVERSTEP".
